data.title: ABOUT FAA
data.content:
Futurism AI society is a yearly competition that focuses on excellence in science, mathematics and technology, providing young people with the opportunity to compete in individual innovation and team research in regional and national platforms.

By participating in Futurism AI society, students can immerse themselves in rigorous scientific research, gain the excitement of new discoveries, and reap personal achievement and satisfaction as they complete their projects. Our vision is to find and develop the most talented students to succeed in science, mathematics and technology to create a better future.

Founded in 2020, we are an interdisciplinary AI enterprise dedicated to the excellence of Natural Science, Mathematics, Technology, Engineering, and Computer Science. We aimed to incorporate our awards that extend the impact of the AI subjects, and allow students and the public to engage with state of the art topics in the sciences.

We uphold an inclusive and interdisciplinary approach towards AI and reward exceptional students across disciplines. In our era, never has our mission been more signifiant. We are raising awareness for minorities and inclusion in the AI community, helping students to become enthusiasts and visionaries of the future who can address the greatest challenges of our time through power of technology.

The Futurism AI Society supports young scholars from across the globe, to provide a new platform and awards for not just the exceptional, but the responsible researchers whose work can greater impacts on society. We will do everything we can to engage all people, across ideologies, nationalities, ethnicities, class, religion, and beyond.

items.content: Hong Kong TSAF Consulting Ltd. is at the forefront of technological innovation with the Futurism AI Award (FAA), designed to ignite the innovative spirit of youth worldwide. Our mission transcends showcasing technological marvels; we are committed to cultivating a generation of innovators who are encouraged to explore and evolve their talents within a framework of diversity in thought, fairness, and community building. We adhere to the highest standards of integrity, transparency, and independence, ensuring a fair and objective evaluation of all submissions.

FAA winners are heralded on a global stage, receiving extensive media exposure and having their projects promoted across various platforms. Each laureate is awarded a certificate of achievement and letters of recommendation, underscoring their professional and academic prospects within an esteemed network of technological pioneers.

Our 2024 judge panel is a diverse assembly of AI field experts, distinguished professors, and engineers from leading companies. This eclectic mix ensures a comprehensive evaluation process, reflecting a broad spectrum of perspectives and expertise, dedicated to nurturing talent with integrity and innovation.

items.title: AI
items.content:
Participants can choose a statistics project, or an applied mathematics project, or a pure mathematics project.

Participants can choose to submit a research paper, and if appropriate, with video, image or other PDF supplements.

Participants can choose any topic of their choice, and the paper should demonstrate the participant’s original idea and the warrants for a specific thesis.

For example, participants can use mathematical knowledge to model the spread of COVID-19 in a modern large city and offer the best times and methods to interrupt rapid spread.

guidelines.content:
Eligibility Requirements
1.Applications are 8-18 years old and have the permission of their legal parent or guardian to participate.

2.Attended a AI educational program at an accredited academic institution or homeschooling equivalent with full registration at an official institution.

3.Continuous AI projects can be enrolled if applications are completed in any academic year.

4.All submitted works or results must be original.Any applicant suspected of plagiarism or infringement will be disqualified from the competition,and the applicant will bear the legal responsibility.

5.The length of the project or paper is up to the discretion of the participant,but should convey the topic effectively.
Application Process
1.Fill in the application form(personal information,school information,category,reason)and submit the application fee.Check your spelling carefully including all login information,email addresses,etc.Incorrect email addresses may result in transmission of important information being delayed or unsuccessful.

2.Submit entries in the selected category.

3.Update or modify the submitted work,if necessary,within the specified time period.

4.Waiting for the results.

timeline.value: June 30, submissions accepted starting March 1. No further registrations will be accepted after the deadline.
Winners will be posted in the winning entries section of the website.

donation.content:
Support the Future of Innovation and Talent
Hong Kong TSAF Consulting Ltd.warmly invites you to support the Futurism AI Award(FAA),Dynamic Art Award(DAA),and Cosmopolitan Writing Award(CWA),together shaping the future of technology,art,and literature.
Your Impact
At the heart of our efforts is the vision to foster a new generation of innovators,artists,and writers who can think diversely,act fairly,and contribute to their communities.By donating to these awards,you're not just funding a prize; you're investing in the future leaders of innovation,art,and literature.
Awards&Recognition
Winners of these prestigious awards Winners of these prestigious awards gain global recognition,media exposure,and opportunities for professional and academic advancement.Your donation directly contributes to the certificates of achievement,letters of recommendation,and promotion of their innovative work.
How to Donate
Initiate Your Contribution:To support the Futurism AI Award(FAA),Dynamic Art Award(DAA),or the Cosmopolitan Writing Award(CWA),simply send us an email expressing your interest in donating.Whether you wish to contribute to a specific award or to the general fund affecting all awards,your support is invaluable.Contact Us:Email us at[support@FuturismAI.Com]with the subject line"Donation Inquiry."Please include your name,contact information,and any specific award you're interested in supporting or if you'd prefer to contribute to the general fund.Personalized Support:Our dedicated support team will get back to you promptly to guide you through the donation process.We're here to ensure your contribution is processed smoothly and to answer any questions you may have about the impact of your donation.
